section.para: To access the master list of available Label Form definitions, select the "Label Forms" option. The following screen will appear:
The Label Forms master list displays information on all available Label Form definitions, including Label Form name and number of labels per page.
To the far right of the list, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens screen for adding a new Label Form definition to the master list of Label Forms.

Enables you to edit highlighted Label Form definitions. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Label Form definition—except that when editing, the fields will contain Label Form information. Double-clicking on a Label Form will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Label Form and then select this button to remove the Label Form from the master list.
